info.title: Secure Data Access API
info.description: Secure Data Access API for the i3-Market Project

tags.description: Endpoints for agreement and market fee

tags.name: StreamAuthController
tags.description: Endpoints used by mqtt broker to authenticate the consumer

post.description: Endpoint to retrieve the public key of the provider.
Endpoint to pay the market fee.

get.description: Endpoint to retrieve the agreement id.

post.description: Endpoint to retrieve the data exchange agreement.
Endpoint to retrieve the proof of publication.
Endpoint to check if the non-repudiable protocol was completed for a block of data.

get.description: Endpoint to get all the verification requests for an agreement.
Endpoint to get information about a transfered data block.
Endpoint to get the subscription id.
Endpoint to get information about a subscription.
Endpoint to get information about ammount of data transfered for a consumer.
Endpoint to retrieve a bearer token as provider.
Endpoint to retrieve a bearer token as consumer.

post.description: Endpoint to register or unregister a datasource.
Endpoint for the datasource to send data to. The data will be forwarded to the mqtt broker.
Endpoint to check if topic subscribed to matches the requirements.
